description: Invoice must be paid within 10 days of the invoice date
Invoice must be paid within 14 days of the invoice date
Invoice must be paid within 30 days of the invoice date
Invoice must be paid within 45 days of the invoice date
Invoice must be paid within 60 days of the invoice date
Payment is due as soon as the buyer receives the invoice
Payment is due at the end of the month in which the invoice is received
Buyer must pay before the product is produced or the service is rendered
Buyer pays 50% of the total amount before the service or product is provided and the remaining 50% after delivery.
Cash should be paid when the goods are delivered
